column2: A $CRUSADE$ has been declared to reclaim all parts of the §Y$TITLE$§! held by §Y$ENEMY$§!.
column3: Sa Sainteté le §Y$POPE$§! a lancé une $CRUSADE$ pour reconquérir toutes les terres du §Y$TITLE$§! détenues par §Y$ENEMY$§!.
column4: Seine Heiligkeit, §Y$POPE$§! hat einen $CRUSADE$ ausgerufen, um alle Besitztümer des Titels §Y"$TITLE$"§!, die §Y$ENEMY$§! innehat, zurückzufordern.
column6: Su santidad, §Y$POPE$§! ha declarado una $CRUSADE$ para reclamar todas las partes del §Y$TITLE$§! en poder de §Y$ENEMY$§!.

column2: A $CRUSADE$ has been declared a to reclaim all parts of the §Y$TITLE$§! held by §Y$ENEMY$§!.
column3: Sa Sainteté, §Y$POPE$§! a déclaré une $CRUSADE$ pour reconquérir les terres du §Y$TITLE$§! détenues par §Y$ENEMY$§!
column4: Seine Heiligkeit, §Y$POPE$§!, hat einen $CRUSADE$ deklariert, um alle Teile von §Y$TITLE$§!, die von §Y$ENEMY$§! gehalten werden, zurückzufordern
column6: Su Santidad, §Y$POPE$§! ha proclamado una $CRUSADE$ para reclamar todas las partes de §Y$TITLE$§! en posesión de §Y$ENEMY$§!

column2: The Crusaders will take all the land in the targeted title held by §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§! rulers
column3: Les croisés prendront toutes les terres du titre cible détenu par [From.Get_le_TitledNameJ]
column4: Die Kreuzritter nehmen alles Land ein, das von §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! gehalten wird
column6: Los cruzados tomarán toda la tierra del título objetivo que posee §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!

column2: $NAME$ priests may pay tax to the religious head rather than their secular liege
column3: Les évêques de religion $NAME$ peuvent payer leurs impôts auprès du pape au détriment de leur souverain séculier
column4: $NAME$e Bischöfe können beschließen, die Steuern dem Papst statt dem weltlichen Lehnsherrn zu zahlen.
column6: Los obispos $NAME$ pueden pagar el impuesto al Papa, en lugar de a su señor secular

column3: Les religieux terriens peuvent hériter de titres
column4: Priester (Eigentümer der Tempel) können Titel erben
column6: Los sacerdotes (titulares de templo) pueden heredar títulos

column2:
To the Excellent [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s coronation, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion by allowing one of [Root.GetHerHisCap] [son_holyorder_candidate.GetSonDaughter]s to do [son_holyorder_candidate.GetHerHis] part in the sacred war against the infidels by joining the [son_holyorder_host.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]
I will not risk my [son_holyorder_candidate.GetSonDaughter]'s life for a crown.

To the Just [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] patriotism by allowing one of [Root.GetHerHisCap] [son_holyorder_candidate.GetSonDaughter]s to do [son_holyorder_candidate.GetHerHis] part in the struggle to preserve America by joining [son_holyorder_host.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
The Order of Our Lady Liberty

The Order of Our Lady Liberty is one of the most ancient and respected Americanist orders. What started as a small group of women dedicated to preservation and protection of the Statue of Liberty, grew into its own splinter faith, diverging from the Americanist mainstream. The First Lady of the Order is overall responsible for all Libertarians, and all sanctioned Libertarian preachers are members of the Order.
A suitable vassal [Root.GetPriest] is available to perform the ceremony
column3: Un évêque vassal est disponible pour célébrer la cérémonie
column4: Ein Vasallen-Bischof ist verfügbar, der die Zeremonie durchführt
column6: Hay un obispo vasallo disponible para realizar la ceremonia

column2:
To the Liberal [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] donates a sizable sum of money to the Order of Our Lady Liberty as a show of [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion.

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The Order and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] cares much for the souls of our members. As such we would like to advise you to go on a pilgrimage, since you have not yet done so.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetMOGreeting] [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are glad to hear that you have performed a pilgrimage in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

You must perform a patriotic pilgrimage to reflect upon the greatness of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]. This spiritual journey will help you reflect upon yourself and increase your standing with the order.
To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'[Root.Religion.GetName] Pilgrimage'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete the pilgrimage.

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullBaseName] is in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. Therefore we ask of you to donate any of the castles in your demesne - either existing or yet to be constructed.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

Blessed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are grateful for your help in providing for [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. This new fortress will be a great boon to us in our task to carry out the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

The [Root.Society.GrandMaster.GetSocietyRank] has requested that you donate a castle to [Root.Society.GrandMaster.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. This would allow the Holy Order to serve [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] better - and doing this would greatly increase your standing in [Root.Society.GetName].
To complete this mission, activate the Special Title Action §Y'Donate a Castle'§! on any allowed castle holding. You may also build a new castle and donate it.

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The grand statue of our Lady has been pillaged and desecrated by vile bandits! As the enlightening visage of Lady Liberty falls under your demesne, it is your duty to spare no expense to restore her to her previous state.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

One of our sisters has came up with plans to restore parts of Lady Liberty that have been lost or damaged in the unrest following the Calamity. As the enlightening visage of Lady Liberty falls under your demesne, it is your duty to spare no expense to restore her to her former glory.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

Just [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are eternally grateful for your part in caring for our Lady. She will surely light your way and bless you with her wisdom in reward.
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To damnable [Root.GetTitledFirstName], servant of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]
By desecrating our holy Lady Liberty, you have commited a grave sin that will forever haunt you! As of now, you are an enemy of all patriotic Libertarians. May you burn in agnoy, and your possessions turn to ash!

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

To damnable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
By desecrating our holy Lady Liberty, you have made yourself an enemy of all upstanding Libertarians. May you feel her righteous wrath soon.

With anger and sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
I have recieved the news of you losing the domain surrounding our Lady with great saddness. In light of this, I must consider your task of caring for the Lady failed.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

Lady Liberty has been pillaged by servants of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. The [Root.Society.GrandMaster.GetSocietyRank] has asked you to restore her to her former glory, as the Lady lies in your demesne.
To complete this mission, §Yrestore§! the Great Work of §Y'Lady Liberty'§! in §Y[c_palisades.GetName]§!.\nLosing control over the Great Work will fail the mission.
Build a next stage of Lady Liberty
Lady Liberty needs to be restored to her ancient form. The [Root.Society.GrandMaster.GetSocietyRank] has tasked you with overseeing the construction, as the Lady lies in your demesne.
To complete this mission, §Ybuild next stage§! of the Great Work of §Y'Lady Liberty'§! in §Y[c_palisades.GetName]§!.\nLosing control over the Great Work will fail the mission.
Start planning the theft of the §YMarble Bust§!!
Start planning the theft of §YOld World Money§!!

Madisonians differ from mainstream Americanism in that they consider the judicary the supreme branch of the government. Legends of Justices of the Supreme Court fighting against tyrannical Presidents and Congressmen have filled them with a conviction that a Chief Justice of the Supreme Court is the superior authority on all matters spiritual and temporal.
If I am patriotic enough and control Washington, I can restore the Supreme Court to its rightful place, so that it may guide all patriots, as says [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
Restore the Supreme Court in Washington
The Chief Justice has lost control of Washington, but it is within my power to restore the Capital to him!

Washington, for centuries the capitol of the United States, is in Madisonian hands. This has given me an opportunity to restore the Supreme Court to its rightful place, so that it may guide all patriots, as says [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].

Washington, for centuries the capitol of the United States, is in Madisonian hands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has therefore seen fit to restore the Supreme Court to its rightful place, claiming that it is Madison's will.

I have granted Washington to its rightful ruler, so that the Chief Justice may adjudicate in the building of the Supreme Court. The Chief Justice shall soon take up [d_supreme_court.Holder.GetHerHis] abode in the offices historically occupied by [d_supreme_court.Holder.GetHerHis] pre-Calamity predecessors.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted Washington to its rightful ruler, so that the Chief Justice may adjudicate in the building of the Supreme Court. The Chief Justice shall soon take up [d_supreme_court.Holder.GetHerHis] abode in the offices historically occupied by [d_supreme_court.Holder.GetHerHis] pre-Calamity predecessors.
This judge is probably next in line for a Justiceship when one becomes available.
Of all the judges in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Justice by the Chief Justice.
The Senior Justice of the Supreme Court is the judge next in line to become Chief Justice
A war over the [Root.GetConclaveName], and what is the righteous way forward for the faith.
Impious [Root.RelHead.GetTitle] won the war for the [Root.GetConclaveName]
By not seeking legitimacy directly from the [Root.GetConclaveName], your inauguration will §ROffend§! the §Y[Root.RelHead.GetTitle]§!.

column6: un prelado notable de la Iglesia

column2: This ruler was inaugurated by a minor judge.\nA formal inauguration is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle].
This ruler was inaugurated by [Root.GetCrownedByDesc].\nA formal inauguration is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle].
This ruler was inaugurated by the [Root.RelHead.GetTitle].\nA formal inauguration is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle].
This President was inaugurated by [Root.GetCrownedByDesc].\nA formal inauguration is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper President.
Write a letter to [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName], asking [Root.RelHead.GetSheHe] to inaugurate you as [Root.GetTitle].

To the Illuminating [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] donates a sizable sum of money to [Root.RelHead.GetTitle]'s preservation efforts as a show of [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion.

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]
Now that I have the [Root.RelHead.GetTitle] to officiate my inauguration, I must decide how much I wish to spend on the ceremony leading up to it.
[Root.GetTitledName] gains the trait Inaugurated by the [Root.RelHead.GetTitle]

To the Illustrious [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion by organizing a private feast in honor of an ardent servant of Justice such as I am.

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]

To the Patriotic [Root.GetTitledName],\nI shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion by donating the [scoped_artifact.GetName] [Root.GetSheHe] holds for the good of all patriots.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as [Root.GetHighGodName] intended - as soon as you recognize that the Judicary is no servant to any ruler, but to blind and fair Justice, equal and independent for all. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as [Root.GetHighGodName] intended - as soon as you recognize that the Order is no servant to any earthly ruler, but to our illustrious Lady.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
[Root.RelHead.GetTitle] or not, you are still my vassal.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you make a one-time increase to the budget of the Judicary. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you make a donation to the Order of Our Lady Liberty. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you officially proclaim that it is no business of the [Root.GetTitle] to appoint members of the judicary. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you prove your devotion to [From.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] by waging war against a most criminal ruler whose wickedness made worthy of official censure. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, but first, let us celebrate this joyous occasion with a lavish feast. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] made good use of my money: the mansion in [FromFrom.Location.GetName] has been filled to the brim with wine and whores. Soon after the start of the celebration for my upcoming coronation, the crowd of lechers and drunks invited to the party are already debasing themselves in the most abominable acts imaginable.

When my guards come to recover me in the morning, I barely remember anything of what has happened last night. I am fairly certain to remember, amongst other things, seeing [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] crown me on top of a fountain of wine, as naked as on the day [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] was born.

Militarism is a splinter Americanist movement that formed as a consequence of the death of President Wyatt Kelleher at the hands of the Deitsch. Finding inspiration in the legends of America's ancient heroes, the United States Military, the Militarists have denounced the Post-Event Presidency as a pathetic farce, and sworn that they shall one day reunite America, by fire and sword if need be.
This character is a descendant of the brave Supreme Commander [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], who restored the Supreme Allied Command, to which all Militarists answer to.
This character is a descendant of the brave Supreme Commander [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], who restored the Supreme Allied Command, to which all Militarists answer to.

The Militarist Feudal government, much like the ordinary Feudal government, revolves around the oath between liege and vassal, and Militarist Feudal lords can only directly own so many Holdings before they must start to rely on vassals - whose loyalty may vary... The Militarist Feudal government is unique to the [jeffersonian.GetName] faith, and forces a unique succession form on all Militarist Feudal subjects above Count tier, where the direct liege chooses the successor of the vassals below them. Rulers are not allowed to imprison vassals or revoke their titles unless they have broken the law. If you should convert to a non-[jeffersonian.GetName] religion, or become a vassal of a non-[jeffersonian.GetName] ruler, your government form will change to Feudal.

§Y*§! Duchy and Kingdom §YMilitarist Feudal§! subjects use §YMilitarist Appointment§! succession
§Y*§! §YOnly External Vassal Wars§!, §YRegulated Inheritance§! and §YTitle Revocation Allowed§! laws are selected by default
§Y*§! §YMilitarist Feudal§! subjects always provide the same amount of levies regardless of opinion
§Y*§! The §YExecutive Officer§! (Marshal) is always the §YDesignated Regent§!
§Y*§! The §YIncreased Council Power§! faction forms less often

column6: Leyes de la obligación de la nobleza
Obligaciones nobles profundamente centradas en los impuestos

column2: This law governs how much tax and levies the gentry in the realm are obliged to contribute. The gentry tend to favor paying taxes over making troops available for their liege.
column3: Cette loi détermine de combien d'impôts et de levées de troupes les vassaux nobles du royaume sont obligés de s'acquitter. La petite noblesse a tendance à favoriser le paiement d'impôts à la levée de troupes pour son seigneur lige.
column4: Das Gesetz reguliert, wie viele Steuern und Truppen die Oberschicht zu liefern hat. Die Oberschicht zieht es vor, dem Lehnsherrn Geld statt Truppen zu liefern.
column6: Esta ley determina con cuántos impuestos y levas está obligada a contribuir la nobleza del reino. La nobleza tiende a favorecer el pago de impuestos frente a poner disponibles para su señor.
Obligaciones nobles centradas en los impuestos

column2: The ruler and their liege can nominate a successor from among the vassals of the ruler. While the liege has complete control over the selection, the ruler can use Favors to force their nominee to be selected. This succession law is unique for Militarist Feudal realms.
Spend a §YFavor§! to force your liege to appoint your designated heir as your successor.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will select your designated heir for your successor for 120 months.
With some of the most important holy sites of the Militarist faith now under my direct control the time has come to bring order back to America by restoring the Supreme Allied Command
As an adult practitioner of the Militarist faithn I am able to choose one of ancient America's many ancient Generals to emulate.

Since the humiliating defeat and death of President Kelleher at the hands of the Deitsch the Militarist faithful have shunned the Post-Event Presidency, which in turn, earned them the ire of the Americanist faith. However, times have changed and now it is the "true" Americanists that find themselves outnumbered and outgunned, as from humble beginnings [Root.GetFullName] has not only managed to extend the reach of the Militarist faith but has also united a vast majority of the faithful under [Root.GetHerselfHimself] banner. Sensing an opportunity, [Root.GetFullName] has proclaimed [Root.GetHerselfHimself] the "Supreme Allied Commander" and has laid claim to all of America, from sea to shining sea...
The time has come for me to find an Ancient American General to emulate - now, which one of them am I most akin to?
Sherman, The Scourge Of The Founders
None of these suit me, maybe I should look further?
This will not do! Show me my other options
This character has fought to retake holy American land.
This character has chosen to become a devotee of General Douglas MacArthur - The Generalissimo.
This character has chosen to become a devotee of General William T. Sherman - The Scourge Of The Founders.
This character has chosen to become a devotee of General George Patton - The Bloody.
This character has chosen to become a devotee of General George A. Custer - The Slayer Of Redskins.
This character has chosen to become a devotee of General Robert E. Lee - The Redeemed.
This character has chosen to become a devotee of General Smedley Butler - The Marine.
You choose General §YSherman§!, the Scourge Of The Founders
You choose General §YCuster§!, the Slayer Of Redskins

For too long, Americans have lived under the rule of tyrants who reject the wisdom of the Founders and worship monstrosities, rust, or men with oversized hats. [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFullName] cannot simply stand by and watch as the oppressors take away the rights of Americans and refuse to honor the Flag, and [Root.GetSheHe] has issued an Executive Order requiring all able-bodied citizens to fight for the restoration of America.

The great city of Washington has fallen into the hands of un-American tyrants. The oppressors are burning the temples of the Founders, defiling their graves, destroying the holy documents, and fluoridating the Potomac River. In response, [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFullName] has issued an Executive Order requiring all able-bodied citizens to fight for the restoration of America.

The great cities of America have fallen into the hands of un-American tyrants. The oppressors will not stop until they have destroyed every remaining bastion of freedom. [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFullName] cannot allow that to happen, and [Root.GetSheHe] has issued an Executive Order requiring all able-bodied citizens to fight for the restoration of America.

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the adherents of '[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]' in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] patriots are called to arms in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe holy lands of America will be reclaimed from the [New.Religion.GetName] infidels!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of '[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]' in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] patriots are called to arms against the uncivilized barbarians!\n\nThese undisciplined scabs will soon know the power of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the [New.Religion.GetName] infidels in [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] patriots are called to arms against the deniers of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
The time has come for me, the President, to sign an Executive Order requiring all able-bodied citizens to fight for the restoration of America.

§Y*§! Enatic law is enforced.
§Y*§! Gaians gain 1.00 purity per month when at peace.
§Y*§! Gaian faith prohibits eating, hunting or otherwise hurting animals.
§Y*§! No penalties for female homosexual rulers.
§Y*§! Gaian females can take a vow to never marry a man, and choose to adopt a lowborn child as their heir.
§Y*§! Are adherents of the ancient practice of Astrology.
Publicly follows the §Y[gaian.GetName]§! religion (or a heresy)
The High Priestess, leading the international effort of bringing more people into the fold.
column3: Le grand prêtre dirige l'effort mondial visant à réunir davantage de personnes dans les rangs de sa société.
column4: Der Hohepriester des $SOCIETY|Y$-Zirkels, der die internationalen Bemühungen leitet, mehr Menschen in den Schoß der Familie zu führen.
column6: El Sumo sacerdote, que dirige la misión a escala internacional para atraer a más fieles.

column2: Themysciraians are a sect of radical, strictly matriarchal Gaians. Believing that men are solely responsible for the ruination of Earth, the followers of Diana are determined to not only prevent that from ever happening again, but also to punish the man for all his sins - real or not. They consider themselves tools of their high god, Diana, who in turn has been created by the Earth Mother, Gaia, to avenge her. Mainstream Gaianism rejects Themysciraism for not only its bloodthirstiness, but also for forgoing the aspect of protection of nature for revenge against what men did in the past.

§Y*§! Enatic law is strictly enforced.
§Y*§! Has access to §YMatriarchal Deposition War§! CB instead of §YHoly War§! CB.
§Y*§! No penalties for female homosexual rulers.
§Y*§! Themysciraian females can take a vow to never marry a man, and choose to adopt a lowborn child as their heir.
§Y*§! Can forcefully adopt very young female prisoners of non-Matriarchal faiths.
§Y*§! Are adherents of the ancient practice of Astrology.

Diana's faithful are forced to live in secret, and their beliefs have been deemed radical and disruptive by an oppressive and destructive society. Although they are forced to participate in this society, true Themysciraians continue to live simple lives and tell others about Diana's grace in secret. Hopefully,  soon they will realize the extend of the Patriarchy's bondage..
The §YThemysciraian§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Themysciraian faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: The High Priestess, leading the international effort of bringing more people into the fold.
column3: Le grand prêtre dirige l'effort mondial visant à réunir davantage de personnes dans les rangs de sa société.
column4: Der Hohepriester des $SOCIETY|Y$-Zirkels, der die internationalen Bemühungen leitet, mehr Menschen in den Schoß der Familie zu führen.
column6: El Sumo sacerdote, que dirige la misión a escala internacional para atraer a más fieles.

column2: This character has decided to reject men from her life, and took a vow to never marry one.
Why should I marry a man? Is it not the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] for women to be free? I should renounce the institution of patriarchial marriage, and take a vow to never marry a man.
Recently, I have amused myself with seducing a handsome young guard. She follows me around like a puppy now... a very big, muscular puppy!
column3: Je passe mes heures depuis peu à séduire un jeune garde avenant. Il me suit comme un chiot désormais... un chiot très musclé et imposant !
column4: Vor Kurzem habe ich mir dadurch Vergnügen verschafft, indem ich einen hübschen jungen Wachsoldaten verführte. Jetzt folgt er mir überall hin, wie ein Hündchen... ein ziemlich großes und muskelbepacktes Hündchen!
column6: Recientemente, me he divertido seduciendo a un guapo guardia joven. Ahora me sigue como un cachorro.. ¡un gran y musculoso cachorro!

column2: Make her a squire and keep her as my lover...
column3: En faire un écuyer et le garder comme amant...
column4: Ich ernenne ihn zu einem Adeligen und behalte ihn als Liebhaber...
column6: Lo convertiré en escudero y lo guardaré como amante...

column2: Give her a tumble and I'll have the most loyal bodyguard ever!
column3: Se livrer à des petites cabrioles, et en faire le garde le plus loyal qui existe !
column4: Ich lasse ihn in mein Bett und verschaffe mir den treuesten Leibwächter überhaupt!
column6: ¡Le daré un revolcón y tendré el más guardaespaldas más leal jamás habido!

column2: After a long search, a young [adopted_child.GetBoyGirl] by the name of [adopted_child.GetFirstName] has been found who might make for an ideal candidate. Your councillors tell you [adopted_child.GetSheHe] comes from an orphanage in [adopted_province.GetName], [adopted_child.GetHerHis] parents both killed recently. Although a bit grimy and shy, you feel the child might make a good ruler one day, provided [adopted_child.GetSheHe] is cleaned up and raised properly.
Allows to §YAdopt a Heir§! if there are no suitable children of your blood to inherit

Since I lack a suitable child, and are either unable or unlikely to become a parent of one, I may adopt an orphaned [Root.Religion.GetName] child and raise it as their own - an act of generosity, if you will, towards someone who in any other circumstance would have few chances at a meaningful life.
Begin the search for a suitable child to adopt
This character was not born into their family, but adopted into it -- an uncommon practice, and thus making them, in the eyes of most, worse even than a bastard.
Make [Root.GetFullName] your adopted child and raise [Root.GetHerHim] as your own.

Become a parent of [Root.GetFullName].
Due to [Root.GetFullName]'s age, they will not resist.
§RParents of [Root.GetFullName] will become your enemies for life.
All close relatives of [Root.GetFullName] will be upset.§!

column4: [FromFrom.GetBestName] hat [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] dazu gezwungen, seine Konkubine zu werden!
column6: ¡[FromFrom.GetBestName] ha forzado a mi [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] a convertirse en su concubina!

column2: [abductor.GetBestName] has forced my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFullName] to become [abductor.GetHerHis] [From.GetSonDaughter], and is now raising them as [abductor.GetHerHis] own!
[abductor.GetBestName] has forced my [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFullName] to become [abductor.GetHerHis] [From.GetSonDaughter], and is now raising them as [abductor.GetHerHis] own!

As I pick up the fragile, little body of [From.GetFirstName], I cannot help but wonder what sort of a [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetSheHe] will be, now that I will raise [From.GetHerHim] in accordance to the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], as I would have raised a [From.GetSonDaughter] of my own blood.
§Y*§! May undertake journeys to seek & salvage old world technology.\n§Y*§! May take ambitions to remove irrational impulses.\n§Y*§! May choose to voluntarily replace their limbs with prosthetics.
With a suitable prosthetic in my possession, I can remove one of my flesh limbs so that it may be replaced by a superior chrome and metal.
Choose a suitable limb to be removed, so that you may use the prosthetic in your treasury.

You lay down on the table, bracing yourself for the ritual. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] waits for you to point at which inferior, flesh part of your body you wish to discard, so that it may be replaced with holy chrome and metal.
This character has chose to voluntarily replace one of their limbs with a prosthetic, gaining them respect from all the Chrome Cultists.

When the first of the Rust Cult stumbled upon an abandoned factory of the old world, what he saw seemed to be the handiwork of the gods. The cult quickly spread through the former Rust Belt, worshiping these houses of the divine and the technological marvels wrought within, which they are willing to defend with their lives. Rust Cultists dedicate much of their time to recovering and revering any old world technology they can find. Due to their age however, opportunities to find operational relics are few and far between.
§Y*§! May undertake journeys to seek & salvage old world technology.

The factories of the ancients sprawl endlessly, attesting the great might of Vulcan and his servants. Yet even so, rust cultists suffer oppression from those who see the artifacts of Ford and Vulcan as mere tools, as if they could be compared to items of mere human manufacture. The Forgotten keep their faith to themselves, but share it only with those of their own faith, though they look forward to a time when the machine spirits will revive the works of the ancients and they can break free from the creeping destruction of the Consuming Tarnish which envelops this world.
The §YRust Cultist§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Rust Cultist mechanists have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: Ever since its humble roots, Christians have marked themselves by their refusal to abandon their faith in the face of persecution. So it is that a rich tradition of martyrs and underground parishes can give hope to groups of believers in even the darkest of times, no matter what they are outwardly forced to profess. To each other they can profess their true faith in God, and their God is love.
The §YExovedate§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Exovedate faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: §Y*§! Rulers can gain Sympathy towards American Native, Judaist or Pagan religious group.

The Corporate Feudal government, much like the ordinary Feudal government, revolves around the oath between liege and vassal, and Corporate Feudal lords can only directly own so many Holdings before they must start to rely on vassals - whose loyalty may vary... The Corporate Feudal government is unique to the [consumerist.GetName] faith and its heresies, and allows holding Cities in addition to Castles.
§Y*§! Cannot use Gavelkind, Elective Gavelkind, Primogeniture or Ultimogeniture succession laws if the Council is Empowered\n§Y*§! No wrong government penalty if liege or subject is a Republic

The Christian population of Canada is divided between the Anglican Church and the Ursuline See. If we control enough of the great cities of Canada, we can unify them into a single Confederated Church under our control.

The Christians of Canada are no longer divided between the Anglican Church and the Ursuline See. Thanks to the efforts of [From.GetTitledFirstName], the churches have been unified into the Confederated Church of Canada, headed by the Archbishop in Ottawa, who will also serve as an advisor to the [From.GetTitle].
§Y*§! The Archbishop is elected via the same mechanics as the Pope.
The Prolocutor is the Bishop expected to succeed the current Archbishop.
column3: Le preferatus est le cardinal favori pour succéder au pape actuel.
column4: Der Preferatus ist der Kardinal, dem die größten Chancen für die Wahl zum Papst eingeräumt werden.
column6: El Preferatus es el cardenal que se espera que suceda al Papa actual.

column2: This bishop is probably next in line for a Synod Membership when one becomes available.
column3: Cet évêque sera probablement le prochain cardinal dès qu'une place se libérera.
column4: Dieser Bischof wird wahrscheinlich als nächster zum Kardinal ernannt, wenn ein Sitz im Kollegium frei wird.
column6: Este obispo será, probablemente, el próximo Cardenal cuando haya una vacante.

column2: Of all the bishops in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Synod Member by the Archbishop.
column3: De tous les évêques de mon royaume, celui-ci est le plus susceptible d'être nommé cardinal par le pape.
column4: Von allen Bischöfen in meinem Reich wird dieser wahrscheinlich am ehesten vom Papst zum Kardinal ernannt.
column6: De todos los obispos de mi Reino, este es el que tiene más probabilidades de que el Papa lo nombre Cardenal.

column2: This Abbess is probably next in line for a Delegateship when one becomes available.

column4: Dieser Bischof wird wahrscheinlich als nächster zum Kardinal ernannt, wenn ein Sitz im Kollegium frei wird.
column6: Este obispo será, probablemente, el próximo Cardenal cuando haya una vacante.

column2: Of all the bishops in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Delegate by the Abbess-General.
column3: De tous les évêques de mon royaume, celui-ci est le plus susceptible d'être nommé cardinal par le pape.
column4: Von allen Bischöfen in meinem Reich wird dieser wahrscheinlich am ehesten vom Papst zum Kardinal ernannt.
column6: De todos los obispos de mi Reino, este es el que tiene más probabilidades de que el Papa lo nombre Cardenal.

column2: Quebec City, the very seat of the Abbess-General herself, has fallen to infidels. In response, the Abbess-in-exile, Her Holiness, [Root.GetTitledName], has declared her intention to forge a great alliance of Ursuline lords in order to reclaim the eternal city. This signals a new era of large scale Ursuline holy wars - the Crusades.
column3: Rome, ville de saint Pierre et siège de la papauté, est tombée aux mains des infidèles. En réponse, le pape en exil, Sa Sainteté [Root.GetTitledName], a déclaré son intention de conclure une grande alliance de seigneurs chrétiens afin de reprendre la ville éternelle. Cette décision annonce une nouvelle ère de guerres chrétiennes à grande échelle : les Croisades.
column4: Die Heilige Stadt Rom, Sitz des Papstes, ist von den Ungläubigen erobert worden. Als Antwort darauf hat der Exilpapst, seine Heiligkeit [Root.GetTitledName] seine Entschlossenheit zum Sschmieden eines großen Bündnisses christlicher Herrscher bekannt gegeben, um die Ewige Stadt zurückzuerobern. Dies ist der Beginn eines neuen Zeitalters großer christlicher Heiliger Kriege - der Kreuzzüge.
column6: Roma, ciudad de San Pedro y sede del mismísimo Papado, ha caído en manos de los infieles. En respuesta, el Papa exiliado, Su Santidad [Root.GetTitledName], ha declarado su intención de forjar una gran alianza de señores cristianos con el fin de recuperar la ciudad eterna. Este hecho marca el inicio de una nueva era de guerras santas cristianas de gran alcance: las Cruzadas.

column2: This priest follows the Lutheran school of thought, focusing on learning and the acceptation of sainthood.
This priest follows the Baptist school of thought, focusing on proselytizing and missionary work.
This priest follows the Methodist school of thought, focusing on rigorous execution of the Church dogma.

§Y*§! Priests belong to one of three main denominations - Lutheran, Baptist and Methodist.
§Y*§! A Lutheran Council President allows canonization of saints.
§Y*§! A Baptist Council President allows faster province convertion.
§Y*§! A Metodist Council President increases Moral Authority.
Miracolously, the Salt Lake Temple has survived the Event. Ever since then, it has been meticulously preserved and cared for by Mormon faithful, Angel Moroni still topping the spire.
Miracolously, the Salt Lake Temple has survived the Event. Ever since then, it has been meticulously preserved and cared for by Mormon faithful, Angel Moroni still topping the spire.

§Y*§! Can venerate ancestors\n§Y*§! May go on vision quests with the aid of sacramental herbs.

Much lower chance of provincial revolts
